query:
-- First, create Stickers category if it doesn't exist
INSERT INTO product_categories (name, slug, description)
SELECT 'Stickers', 'stickers', 'Fun and inspiring stickers featuring Desert Paddleboards designs'
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM product_categories WHERE slug = 'stickers');

-- Get the category ID
SET @category_id = (SELECT id FROM product_categories WHERE slug = 'stickers');

-- Add the three sticker products
INSERT INTO products (category_id, name, slug, description, price, image_url, is_digital, inventory, is_active)
VALUES 
  (@category_id, 'Take It Easy Go With The Flow Sticker', 'take-it-easy-sticker', 'Relax on your paddleboard with this fun desert sunset sticker. Features a laid-back character enjoying the flow on the water with saguaro cacti and mountains in the background. Perfect for water bottles, laptops, or paddleboards!', 500, 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663233691307/TrZzEhFHgYTejlkz.jpeg', 0, 100, 1),
  (@category_id, 'Hydrate and Meditate Playa Sticker', 'hydrate-meditate-sticker', 'Stay hydrated and zen with this playful sticker featuring a peaceful character with a water bottle. Perfect reminder to take care of yourself while enjoying your paddleboard adventures. Waterproof and durable for any surface!', 500, 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663233691307/RRVUEecYyiUSWzeu.jpeg', 0, 100, 1),
  (@category_id, 'Zen AF Sticker', 'zen-af-sticker', 'Embrace your inner peace with this meditation-inspired sticker. Features a serene character in lotus position with a peace symbol, perfect for anyone who loves yoga, meditation, and paddleboard soundbaths. Weatherproof vinyl construction!', 500, 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663233691307/UBrADGBzoeZDfXXx.jpeg', 0, 100, 1)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=name;
